title: BRIEF-Maxim Power Corp Announces Amendments To Convertible Loan Agreement By Reuters
text:
BRIEF-Maxim Power Corp Announces Amendments To Convertible Loan Agreement

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 21:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Maxim Power Corp Announces Amendments To Convertible Loan Agreement Oct 3 (Reuters) - Maxim (NASDAQ: ) Power Corp : * MAXIM POWER CORP. ANNOUNCES AMENDMENTS TO CONVERTIBLE LOAN AGREEMENT * MAXIM POWER CORP SAYS CONVERSION PRICE OF CONVERTIBLE LOAN HAS BEEN INCREASED FROM $1.90 PER SHARE TO $2.25 PER SHARE

BRIEF-Maxim Power Corp Announces Amendments To Convertible Loan Agreement
description: BRIEF-Maxim Power Corp Announces Amendments To Convertible Loan Agreement
